entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
